resources.string: failed connection to geocaching.com (server or connection down?)
user has not agreed to Geocaching.com license agreement
Sorry, c:geo can\'t open geocache details.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t display geocache you want. Is it really geocache?
Sorry, c:geo can\'t find that geocache.
Sorry, c:geo forgot which geocache you want.
c:geo can\'t read some cache details. Please check if you have geocaching.com website set to English. Unfortunately, c:geo doesn\'t understand other localizations.
c:geo found no spoiler images for this cache.
c:geo found no static maps for this cache.
This function requires Radar application. Would you install it?
c:geo can\'t start Android Market to search for Radar application.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t start Radar application. Is installed?
c:geo can\'t find any supported navigation.
c:geo can\'t find any suitable application.
Sorry, c:geo failed to initialize authorization process.
c:geo has not enough information to log visit. Please, do it from full cache details.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t clear your login.
show direction to caches in its list
Please write PIN code provided by Twitter website. It\'s mandatory to complete authorization.
c:geo is now authorized to post on your Twitter.
To use services of geocaching.com (and this application does), you must agree with terms and conditions of Groundspeak disclaimer.

c:geo is designed to be simple always ready-to-go client for geocaching.com. It is and forever will be for free. If you want to support development, you can donate (on the website). Questions, suggestions? Use Facebook or e-mail me.

Service Go 4 cache allows you to see other geocachers on the map (in c:geo or in browser) in real time. It can show you for example what cache they\'re searching for. By connecting to Go 4 cache you allows c:geo to public your current location when geocaching (only when c:geo is running).
Do you want to publish new status on Twitter everytimes you log find through c:geo?
The following proccess allows c:geo to access your Twitter account - if you agree.

Click on "authorize c:geo" button will start process. This process will open web browser with Twitter page where you have to login and Accept c:geo to access your account. When you Accept, Twitter will show you numeric PIN code. Please copy this code, paste into c:geo and confirm. That\'s all.
